snippet: A Broadway revival of “A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum” has been postponed now that the star, James Corden, has been named the new host of “The Late, Late Show” on CBS.
abstract: Broadway revival of A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum is postponed after star James Corden is named new host of the Late Late Show on CBS.
lead_paragraph: A Broadway revival of “A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum” has been postponed now that the star, James Corden, has been named the new host of “The Late, Late Show” on CBS.
